basics.name: Hoku Tobin
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student purusing a B.S. in Informational and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Tentative graduation date is Fall 2020

work.summary: Assisting customers learning about Apple products and Services that can help better their lives and pursue their passions
highlights: Assisting customers in finding the best solution to enrich their life with Apple products.
Configuring new Apple devices such as cellular phones and smart watches.
Assisting customers to become familiar with features of new operating systems and devices.
Developing genuine relationships with customers and gauging their rapport with random surveys.

work.company: University of Hawai'i at Manoa-Infomation Techonology Services
work.summary: Assisting instructors, staff, students, and alumni with their mobile devices, computers, and office peripherals. Along with network and UH services monitoring
highlights: Maintained and monitored UH Systems such as 'Olelo Hawai'i TV and UH network infrastructure across all campuses, and reporting any issues that arise.

Assisted users with navigating and understanding University of Hawaii applications such as Gmail @ UH, STAR (class sign-up), and Laulima (classroom correspondence where teachers can post assignments, forums, and other class materials).
Assisted users with troubleshooting technical issues with their computers or mobile devices either over the phone, via email, or using Bomgar remote desktop assistance.

work.summary: Assisting customers in finding solutions to make their house a 'smart home'
highlights: Sold products and services available at Best Buy by genuinely understanding a client's wants and/or needs.
Achieved an understanding of smart home products, then explaining and demonstrating the products for clients.
Achieved understanding of networking devices such as routers ,modems, extenders, etc...and explaining the differences between different models, brands, and devices.
Determined customer satisfaction rating with random surveys

work.summary: Oversee a small restaurant with a small group of baristas and cooks
highlights: Supervised a small team of baristas (5- 9) and cooks (2-4)
Trained new cooks and baristas procedures for restaurant kitchen, and coffee bar
Co-developing new ideas to create new drinks and food items
Communicate effectively and courteously with customers and staff in order to make sure all guidelines created by the restaurant owners and the State of Hawaii are followed.
Handled transactions with vendors and configure electronic point of sale system
